SKT_FIRST.name: Close-Range Fire
SKT_FIRST.name_jp: クローズレンジ・シュート
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> chance to grant increased Attack to the ally with the highest Attack for <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격합니다. 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>50%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 동안 가장 공격력이 높은 아군의 공격력을 증가시킵니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与える。攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>50%</color>の確率で攻撃力が最も高い味方単体の攻撃力を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>の間UPさせる。

SKT_BURST_3.effect: Inflicts Marked on the target before attacking for 2 turns
SKT_BURST_3.effect_jp: 攻撃前に対象に標的付与+2ターン

SKT_SECOND.name: Mid-Range Acrobatic Shooting
SKT_SECOND.name_jp: アクロバット・レンジャー
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: With a <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> chance, increases heroes' Critical Hit Chance and Critical Damage for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>, then attacks the enemy.\n\n<color=#ffd732>When attacking Irregular Monsters</color>, reduces target's Defense for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color> before attacking. This effect ignores Resilience and Immunity.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>80%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 치명 확률과 치명 피해를 증가시킨 후 적을 공격합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>이레귤러 몬스터</color> 공격 시에는 공격 전에 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 대상의 방어력을 감소시킵니다. 이 효과는 대상의 효과 저항 및 면역을 무시합니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: <color=#28d9ed>80%</color>の確率で<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>間、味方全体の会心率と会心ダメージをUPさせてから敵単体にダメージを与える。\n\n<color=#ffd732>イレギュラーモンスター</color>攻撃時、攻撃の前に<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>間、対象の防御力をDOWNさせる。この効果は対象の効果抵抗及び免疫を無視する。

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Voltaic Arrowstorm
SKT_ULTIMATE.name_jp: フォトニック・アロー・レイン
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Has a <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> chance to grant increased Accuracy and Effectiveness to all allies for <color=#28d9ed>2 turn(s)</color>, then attacks all enemies.\nHas a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to reduce <color=#28d9ed>skill cooldowns</color> of all allies except for the caster by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: <color=#28d9ed>70%</color> 확률로 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 아군 전체의 명중과 효과 적중을 증가시킨 후 적 전체를 공격합니다.\n<color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 자신을 제외한 아군 전체의 <color=#28d9ed>스킬 쿨타임</color>을 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: <color=#28d9ed>70%</color>の確率で味方全体の命中と効果命中を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>UPさせた後、敵全体にダメージを与える。\n<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で、自分を除く味方全体の<color=#28d9ed>スキルターン</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させる。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Finish Effect</color>: After attacking, reduces skill cooldowns of all allies by <color=#28d9ed>1 turn(s)</color>.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, increases <color=#28d9ed>Priority</color> of the caster by <color=#28d9ed>20%</color>.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 피니시 효과</color> : 공격 후 아군 전체의 스킬 쿨타임이 <color=#28d9ed>1턴</color> 감소합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>행동 게이지</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>20%</color> 증가시킵니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(トドメ)</color>:攻撃後、味方全体のスキルターンを<color=#28d9ed>1ターン</color>減少させる。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color>:攻撃後、自分の<color=#28d9ed>行動ゲージ</color>を<color=#28d9ed>20%</color>UPさせる。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
